# Schema: `CreateTagAssignmentRequest`

Request payload for creating a new tag assignment on a securable object (schema, table, column, or macro).

- Type: `object`
- Required fields: `securable_id`, `securable_type`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `column_name` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `securable_id` | `string` | `true` | - |
| `securable_type` | `string` | `true` | - |
